page.title: 06OCCUPATIONS IN SELSEY
page.content: We did a small survey to find out Selsey people's occupations. The most popular things to do were managers and teachers but there was a whole range: secretaries, receptionist, packers, book_keeper, 2 consultants, a bank clerk, litigation clerk, a security warden, shop assistants, a delivery man, a milk salesman, painter, two carpenters, JCB digger operator, newsagent, football manager, two mechanics, council officer, plant nursery workers, care_assistants, playgroup helpers, two nurses, home_help, 2 people who care for the elderly, 2 college lecturers, 2 computer engineers. 41 people thought their job was enjoyable, 36 thought it was interesting, 35 thought it was rewarding, 17 thought it was boring and 13 said it was dangerous.
